ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This is an important course because giving talks is crucial to your research.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Learning about how to give a talk is very important when I need to present my research. In addition to talks, I'd like to learn more about writing, job search, etc.

Having to present is a very useful tool, and so doing it every year is something that should continue. However, courses on preparing good conference talks, how to create a winning poster, interviewing for postdocs, other career options for phds; all these topics would be extremely helpful and are currently overlooked.
